column4: Grrr. Has anyone successfully installed regular AIM client on Ubuntu?
GAIM is giving me FITS with stuff I need.
the direct connect feature should work fine with Gaim
My bad.. I haven't used Gaim with AIM proto.. just msn and yahoo.
You could try to install AIM in WINE....
Well I am betting it can be done through Wine.. you just need to know how to use wine
Goto  http://www.AIM.com  front page shows AIM for Linux Version 1.5
It freezes when I download it.
What more can you ask for? A native port of AIM from AOL!
If it freezes.... download it from a different computer.... try that
The AIM from AOL even has a deb package what more could you ask for holy cow
I'm about to try from a different browser.
Honestly.. I have been reading your request for help for 3 hours now! That is the best you could ever ask for... it a goddamned deb!
Had you read the part where I said "I'm trying to"? Get off my back for chrissakes.
sorry.. I didn't mean to come across like that :) lol
